profile.name: Shah Redwan Ahmed
profile.title: Frontend Developer | UI/UX Designer | Competitive Programmer
profile.bio: I am a passionate and dedicated Computer Science and Engineering student at United International University, specializing in Software Engineering and Frontend Development. Skilled in React, Django, Supabase, TailwindCSS, and Figma ‚Äî I aim to craft impactful software solutions and sleek user experiences.

interests: Development of programs for design & analysis of aircraft components (CAD, CFD etc).

experiences.description: As a developer I built responsive, user-centric interfaces using React. I focus on delivering seamless UI/UX through reusable components, state management, and integration with backend APIs to create dynamic web applications.

skills.title: Frontend Development
skills.description: Building responsive, user-centric UIs with React, TailwindCSS, and modern JavaScript frameworks.

skills.title: Backend Development
skills.description: REST APIs, authentication, booking logic, and server-side systems using Django & Node.js.

skills.title: Databases & Cloud
skills.description: Designing schemas, managing users, and deploying scalable apps with Supabase and PostgreSQL.

skills.title: UI/UX Design
skills.description: Creating intuitive, user-friendly experiences with wireframes, prototypes, and design systems in Figma.

skills.title: Mobile & Full-stack
skills.description: Cross-platform apps (React Native) and full-stack integration for web apps.

skills.title: Competitive Programming
skills.description: Problem-solving on Codeforces, LeetCode, HackerRank; national contest experience.

projects.title: VillaEase
projects.description: Full-stack system (React frontend, Django backend, Supabase DB). Features villa listings, calendar availability, booking flow, payment integration, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: WanderNest
projects.description: React + Django + Supabase, with user auth, tour packages, hotel & flight booking pages, and UI/UX-first design.

projects.title: BazarLTD
projects.description: Product listings, cart, checkout, and admin product management. (Frontend + API integration)

projects.title: TenmanBD ERP
projects.description: Business management tools, dashboards, and reports. (React + backend APIs)

projects.title: University Event Admin
projects.description: PHP-based platform to manage university club events, announcements, and forums.

projects.title: Shopify Store (Upwork)
projects.description: Custom Shopify storefront and configuration for a freelance client (themes, product setup, basic scripts).

competitiveProgramming.achievement: Active contributor & contest participant (Codeforces, LeetCode, Vjudge)

contact.message: Feel free to reach out for collaboration, questions, or just to say hi!
